targets.rawSql:
SET application_name = 'Grafana';
SELECT time, cluster_name || ' - vacuum', count FROM reports.autovacuum_log_count('$GraphInterval', $$$__timeFilter(time)$$, $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), $$$ServerName$$, $$$DatabaseName$$, $$$SchemaName$$, $$$TableName$$);

SET application_name = 'Grafana';
SELECT time, cluster_name || ' - analyze', count FROM reports.autoanalyze_log_count('$GraphInterval', $$$__timeFilter(time)$$, $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), $$$ServerName$$, $$$DatabaseName$$, $$$SchemaName$$, $$$TableName$$);

SET application_name TO 'Grafana';
SELECT time, cluster_name || '.' || database_name || '.' || schema_name || '.' || table_name, pages_remain_size FROM reports.autovacuum_log($$$__timeFilter(time)$$, $$$ServerName$$, $$$DatabaseName$$, $$$SchemaName$$, $$$TableName$$, 100000000) ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.title: Test graph for table size after autovacuum

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT database_name FROM reports.postgres_log_databases WHERE cluster_name IN ($ServerName) UNION SELECT DISTINCT database_name FROM reports.autovacuum_logs WHERE cluster_name IN ($ServerName)
list.label: Database Name
list.name: DatabaseName
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT database_name FROM reports.postgres_log_databases WHERE cluster_name IN ($ServerName) UNION SELECT DISTINCT database_name FROM reports.autovacuum_logs WHERE cluster_name IN ($ServerName)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT schema_name FROM reports.autovacuum_logs  WHERE  $__timeFilter(time)     AND cluster_name IN ($ServerName)     AND database_name IN ($DatabaseName) UNION SELECT DISTINCT schema_name FROM reports.autoanalyze_logs  WHERE  $__timeFilter(time)     AND cluster_name IN ($ServerName)     AND database_name IN ($DatabaseName)
list.label: Schema Name
list.name: SchemaName
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT schema_name FROM reports.autovacuum_logs  WHERE  $__timeFilter(time)     AND cluster_name IN ($ServerName)     AND database_name IN ($DatabaseName) UNION SELECT DISTINCT schema_name FROM reports.autoanalyze_logs  WHERE  $__timeFilter(time)     AND cluster_name IN ($ServerName)     AND database_name IN ($DatabaseName)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM reports.autovacuum_logs  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)     AND cluster_name IN ($ServerName)     AND database_name IN ($DatabaseName)     AND schema_name IN ($SchemaName) UNION SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM reports.autoanalyze_logs  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)     AND cluster_name IN ($ServerName)     AND database_name IN ($DatabaseName)     AND schema_name IN ($SchemaName)
list.label: Table Name
list.name: TableName
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM reports.autovacuum_logs  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)     AND cluster_name IN ($ServerName)     AND database_name IN ($DatabaseName)     AND schema_name IN ($SchemaName) UNION SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM reports.autoanalyze_logs  WHERE $__timeFilter(time)     AND cluster_name IN ($ServerName)     AND database_name IN ($DatabaseName)     AND schema_name IN ($SchemaName)
